channel.title: Req: smileys :)
channel.description: So hi moparscape, im looking for someone who can help me to add Smileys in game [317] , i have sprites allready (ripped from 600+) and idk what to do now

item.title: Req: smileys :)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

help is free here and I ASSUME if you look at how the admin/mod modicons are done in the client you should be able to piece together how to make them appear for you .

You can also check some “make several ranks in pi” tutorials ( under the assumption it’s pi ) on r-s or something and it explains a lot about the client/cache portion about modicons.

Read full topic
